attributes.action: Introduce alternative sentances other than a prison term to offenders with child/children under 16 years of age, consider how it will affect the children if a prison term is imposed also with additional alternative options if the offender is not considered violent/danger to the public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this is a appeal to the govenment to assess the length of prison terms to be served by non-violent prisoners with young children, and the impact it has on there children, also to consider alternative punishments other than prison to the offender with child/children.
